paper.title: CMC: A Tool for Compositional Model-Checking of Real-Time Systems

author.org: ENS de Cachan CNRS URA 2236 61 av. Pdt Wilson
Centre of the Danish National Research Foundation. Aalborg University, Fredrik Bajers Vej 7-E

paper.venue: Formal Techniques for (Networked and) Distributed Systems
paper.abstract: In this paper we present a tool (CMC) for compositional model-checking of real-time systems. CMC is based on a completely different method compared to existing real-time verification tools (HYTECH, KRONOS, UPPAAL). After a description of the method, we illustrate its efficiency by considering two examples: the Fischer’s mutual exclusion protocol and a railroad crossing system.
